page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT AND OUR FAMILIES.
page.content: Carlisle is quite small even though it is the main city in N.W.England. It has no polluting industry so the air is clean. A lot of the working members of families in our school work at either,Cavray Foods or Goldenlay Eggs on London Road,on the Durranhill Industrial Estate(probably for Robsons Border Transport),or in the big department stores in town.Several families in our school live in local public houses owned by Matthew Brown, a local brewery who have been fighting a takeover bid by Scottish & Newcastle brewery. The Landlords of the pubs expected that if it happened their pubs would be closed.After a struggle M.Brown.stayed free and Pat Cody, Paul's dad,is quoted in the{Cumberland {News},speaking for all the landlords, "This is great news,there has been a lot of deep worry about our future."
